product_details_and_care:
Marked by two iconic house symbols—interlocking-G hardware and green-and-red web—this canvas-and-leather messenger has a vintage, yet timeless quality. A removable webbed shoulder strap allows you to switch from handheld to crossbody carry.
Top zip closure
Optional shoulder strap
Interior wall pocket
Canvas/leather
Made in Italy
Designer Handbags
Item #5862466
product_size_info:
9 ½"W x 6"H x 3"D. (Interior capacity: small.)
20" strap drop.
1.0 lb.
